text: "The Warrior" is a song by Scandal featuring Patty Smyth, from the album Warrior. The song is used in the television series Knuckles. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1984â€“1985) Peak position Australia (Kent Music Report) 6 South Africa (Springbok Radio) 11 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1984) Position Australia (Kent Music Report) 62 Canada Top Singles (RPM) 22 US Billboard Hot 100 46 ==Certifications== ==References== Category:1984 songs
title: The Warrior (song)
